remarks: Unicity of the left and right identity element of a magma when it exists.  (Contributed by FL, 12-Dec-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
exidu1.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
exidu1 $p |- ( G e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) -> E! u e. X A. x e. X ( ( u G x ) = x /\ ( x G u ) = x ) ) $.
$d G u x $.
$d X u x $.
